title: Understanding Functions in Excel
text: Functions in Excel are predefined formulas that help you perform calculations efficiently. They save time and reduce errors by automating complex calculations.

title: Examples of Excel Functions
text: Some common Excel functions include SUM, AVERAGE, and VLOOKUP. These functions help you add numbers, find averages, and search for values in a table, respectively.

hintAnswer: A predefined formula which allows Excel to perform the calculations for you
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes a function in Excel?
choices: A predefined formula which allows Excel to perform the calculations for you
